name: Create/update rows in a Google Sheet spreadsheet from new update items in Monday
description:
This template periodically checks for updated items in Monday and syncs them with a Google Sheets spreadsheet by creating new rows or updating existing ones.

This template is using a Monday board containing these columns besides the default ones:
1) Status as status
2) Note as text
3) Email as text
4) Phone number as number
5) Due Date as date

The template is using [this sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/14xlOxeoZ-hVC3EqzOY2bD0a4A-WTS9SWo4szbkDUZ50/edit?usp=sharing) Google Sheets spreadsheet as the destination for the Monday items. You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
